DataElement.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory Version 4 Past One Month Quantity Problem Hurt or Ache Anatomic Site Anatomic Site Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A text field to describe in the past one month, hurts or aches experienced in an anatomical site.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory Past 30 Days Quantity Problem Hurt or Ache Anatomic Site
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A parent report or patient self report for measuring health-related quality of life (HRQOL) in healthy children and adolescents and those with acute and chronic health conditions. The PedsQL Measurement Model uses a modular approach that integrates both generic core scales and disease-specific modules into one measurement system. (Copyright 1998-2008 James W. Varni, Ph.D.)_A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution._A question about whether an individual has or had hurts or aches._Named locations of or within the body.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A parent report or patient self report for measuring health-related quality of life (HRQOL) in healthy children and adolescents and those with acute and chronic health conditions. The PedsQL Measurement Model uses a modular approach that integrates both generic core scales and disease-specific modules into one measurement system. (Copyright 1998-2008 James W. Varni, Ph.D.)

Concepts.definition: A parent report or patient self report for measuring health-related quality of life (HRQOL) in healthy children and adolescents and those with acute and chronic health conditions. The PedsQL Measurement Model uses a modular approach that integrates both generic core scales and disease-specific modules into one measurement system. (Copyright 1998-2008 James W. Varni, Ph.D.)
